body_html:
with tf.variable_scope("foo"):
    v = tf.get_variable("v", [1])
    
v1 = tf.get_variable("foo/v")

throws a ValueError

ValueError: Variable foo/v already exists, disallowed. 
Did you mean to set reuse=True in VarScope?
body_text:
with tf.variable_scope("foo"):
    v = tf.get_variable("v", [1])
    
v1 = tf.get_variable("foo/v")

throws a ValueError
ValueError: Variable foo/v already exists, disallowed. 
Did you mean to set reuse=True in VarScope?
body:
```
with tf.variable_scope("foo"):
    v = tf.get_variable("v", [1])
    
v1 = tf.get_variable("foo/v")
```
throws a ValueError
```
ValueError: Variable foo/v already exists, disallowed. 
Did you mean to set reuse=True in VarScope? 
```
